features.title: Real-time Pose Coach (Dance / Sports)
features.summary: Camera-based pose estimation that detects form errors, counts reps, and gives live corrective feedback (visual + TTS).

features.title: AI Mentor (Ayush-style 3D)
features.summary: Personal 3D avatar mentor visible only to owner; emotional states and voice guidance.

features.title: Ultra Multimodal AI (Text/Voice/Image/Video/Camera)
features.summary: Unified multimodal interface: chat (text), voice input/output, image uploads, video inputs and real-time camera.

features.title: AI Workspace (Docs + Notes + Cloud + Calendar)
features.summary: Integrated Docs/Notes/Cloud/Calendar with AI summarization and voice-to-notes.

features.title: AI Tutor (Class 7–12 Doubt Solver)
features.summary: Subject-wise tutor, step-by-step explanations, mock tests and auto-grader.

features.title: AI Doctor (HealthGPT)
features.summary: Symptom checker, diet guidance, mental-health chat (triage only; no definitive diagnosis).

features.title: AI Coding Assistant
features.summary: Code generation, debugging, in-browser runner, project scaffolding.

features.title: AI Designer + Video Editor
features.summary: Logo/poster generator and basic video editor (trim/overlay).

features.title: AI Business Coach
features.summary: Startup idea generator, market research, financial plan templates.

features.title: Premium vs Free Unlock System
features.summary: Referral & unlock system, admin control for access tiers.

features.title: AI Social Media Helper
features.summary: Caption, script, hashtag suggestions and posting scheduler.

features.title: Multi-language Learning & Translation
features.summary: Teach and translate into many country languages; UI i18n + AI language prompts.

features.title: Handwriting OCR
features.summary: Recognize handwritten notes and convert to text using Tesseract or ML models.

features.title: Advanced Video Editor (FFmpeg)
features.summary: Trim, concat, overlays, subtitles — backend FFmpeg workflows.
